articles.author: Akhtar Faruqui
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD retreats to near $2,018 after halting a winning streak - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price moves slightly lower on Tuesday after halting its three-day winning streak, inching lower to near $2,018 per troy ounce during the Asian trading hours.
articles.content:
• Gold price loses ground as US Dollar improves on Tuesday.
